pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geographically Weighted Partial Correlation Mapper // An interactive mapping tool for geographically weighted correlation and partial correlation. Geographically weighted partial correlation coefficients are calculated following (Percival and Tsutsumida, 2017)doi:10.1553/giscience2017_01_s36 and are described in greater detail in (Tsutsumida et al., 2019)doi:10.5194/ica-abs-1-372-2019 and (Percival et al., 2021)arXiv:2101.03491.
